description:
[{'description': "
The 2021 Honda CR-V Sport is a well-equipped trim level within the CR-V lineup, offering a balance of features, performance, and value. Here are some key features you can expect in the 2021 Honda CR-V Sport:


Engine: It is equipped with a 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, which provides a good balance of power and fuel efficiency. This engine is known for its smooth performance and responsive acceleration.



Transmission: Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT), which is known across most Honda models for its efficiency and smooth operation.



Interior Comfort: The CR-V Sport includes cloth upholstery with sporty trim accents. It has heated front seats, a driver's seat with power adjustments, and ample cargo space thanks to the CR-V's versatile layout.



Infotainment: It comes with a touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration, allowing seamless smartphone connectivity for navigation, music, and hands-free calls.



Exterior Styling: The CR-V Sport may feature 18-inch alloy wheels, fog lights, and sporty exterior accents such as a gloss-black grille and body-colored door handles and mirrors.



Optional Features: Depending on the market and specific configuration, optional features might include a premium audio system, a panoramic sunroof, and leather-trimmed seats.


Overall, the 2021 Honda CR-V Sport is designed for drivers seeking a blend of practicality, comfort, and modern technology in a compact SUV package. It's a popular choice among families and commuters alike due to its reliability, versatility, and extensive feature set
As a Steele Auto Certified vehicle, you have peace of mind that the vehicle has undergone a rigorous 85 point inspection and has been brought up to the highest of standards. Don't forget, at Steele Volkswagen we have financing options available for all credit situations! "}]

description: [{'description': "Radiating premium good looks inside and out, our 2019 Honda CR-V Touring AWD is a dream come true in Platinum White Pearl! Powered by a TurboCharged 1.5 Litre 4 Cylinder generating 190hp while connected to a seamless CVT for amazing passing commands. This trendsetting All Wheel Drive SUV serves up approximately 6.9L/100km along with composed handling and a comfortable ride. Our CR-V Touring is garnering second looks with its sculpted, distinctive stance with full LED headlights, hands-free power tailgate, sunroof, and great-looking alloy wheels on this machine. You'll love spending time in the premium interior of our Touring with its Smart Entry/Walk Away feature, remote engine start, luxurious leather heated power-adjustable front seats, auto-dimming rearview mirror, rain-sensing windshield wipers, and easy fold-down 60/40 split rear seats. Staying safely connected is a breeze with our display audio touchscreen, Bluetooth, HondaLink, Apple CarPlay/Android Auto compatibility, available satellite-linked full-color navigation with voice recognition, available satellite radio and more. Honda's reputation for safety, and durability is further enhanced with our CR-V that's outfitted with a multi-angle rearview camera, ACE body structure, advanced airbags, vehicle stability assist, and ABS. Honda Sensing, featuring lane-keeping assist, adaptive cruise control, and collision/road departure mitigation is also included. Save this Page and Call for Availability. We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership! Steele Chevrolet Atlantic Canada's Premier Pre-Owned Super Center. Being a GM Certified Pre-Owned vehicle ensures this unit has been fully inspected fully detailed serviced up to date and brought up to Certified standards. Market value priced for immediate delivery and ready to roll so if this is your next new to your vehicle do not hesitate. You've dealt with all the rest now get ready to deal with the BEST! description: [{'description': "Experience the 2019 Honda CR-V LX, a versatile and dependable SUV now available at Bruce Honda in Yarmouth, NS. Known for its blend of practicality, comfort, and advanced features, the CR-V LX is an excellent choice for families, commuters, and adventurers alike.The exterior of the 2019 CR-V LX showcases a modern and sleek design, characterized by bold lines, a distinctive front grille, and stylish 17-inch alloy wheels. Its refined appearance is further enhanced by LED daytime running lights and a rear spoiler, adding both functionality and aesthetic appeal.Under the hood, the 2019 CR-V LX is powered by a 2.4-liter 4-cylinder engine, delivering 184 horsepower and a smooth driving experience. Paired with a continuously variable transmission (CVT), this powertrain offers excellent fuel economy and responsive handling, making it perfect for both city commutes and long road trips.Inside the spacious cabin, the 2019 CR-V LX offers a comfortable and well-appointed interior with high-quality materials and advanced features. The interior includes supportive cloth seats, a 5-inch color LCD screen, Bluetooth connectivity, and a rearview camera. The CR-V LX also provides ample cargo space with easy-folding rear seats to accommodate all your gear, whether you're heading to the grocery store or on a weekend getaway.Safety is a top priority in the 2019 CR-V LX, which comes equipped with a suite of advanced safety and driver-assist features. Standard features include the Honda Sensing technologies, which offer adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, collision mitigation braking, and road departure mitigation. These features ensure peace of mind for you and your passengers on every journey.Bruce Honda, located at 166 Starrs Rd in Yarmouth, NS, invites you to explore the 2019 Honda CR-V LX. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a reputation for excellence, Bruce Honda is your trusted destination for this reliable and stylish SUV. "}]

[{'description': "FRESH 2 YEAR MVI!

servcied and lubricated all contact poits of the brake system
BRAND NEW OIL AND FILTER

The 2022 Honda CR-V Sport is a compact SUV known for its reliability, practicality, and modern features. Below are the key details about this model:

Engine and Performance:
Engine: 1.5-liter turbocharged inline-4
Horsepower: 190 hp
Torque: 179 lb-ft
Transmission: Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT) with Sport Mode
Fuel Efficiency: Approximately 28 mpg city / 34 mpg highway (FWD)
Drive Type: Front-wheel drive (FWD) or optional all-wheel drive (AWD)
Dimensions:
Overall Length: 182.1 inches
Width: 73.0 inches
Height: 66.5 inches
Wheelbase: 104.7 inches
Curb Weight: Around 3,337 lbs (FWD)
Interior Features:
Seating Capacity: 5
Upholstery: Cloth or optional leather
Infotainment System: 7-inch touchscreen display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration
Audio System: 6-speaker audio system
Connectivity: Bluetooth hands-free link, USB ports
Comfort: Dual-zone automatic climate control, 8-way power-adjustable driver's seat
Safety and Driver Assistance:
Airbags: Front, side, and curtain airbags
Braking System: Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) with Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD)
Stability Control: Vehicle Stability Assist (VSA) with Traction Control
Advanced Safety Features: Honda Sensing suite, including Collision Mitigation Braking System (CMBS), Road Departure Mitigation System (RDM), Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with Low-Speed Follow, Lane Keeping Assist System (LKAS), Forward Collision Warning (FCW), and Lane Departure Warning (LDW)
Exterior:
Wheels: 18-inch alloy wheels
Lighting: LED headlights, LED fog lights, LED daytime running lights
Mirrors: Power-adjustable, heated side mirrors with integrated turn signals
Sunroof: Optional power moonroof
Additional Features:
Convenience: Smart Entry with Walk Away Auto Lock, Remote Engine Start
Storage: 39.2 cubic feet of cargo space behind the rear seats, expanding to 75.8 cubic feet with rear seats folded
Other Features: Roof rails, rear privacy glass
Additional Notes:
The 2022 Honda CR-V Sport offers a balanced mix of performance, comfort, and advanced safety features, making it a strong contender in the compact SUV segment. It is designed to meet the needs of families and individuals looking for a versatile and reliable vehicle.

If you have any specific questions or need more detailed information about this model, feel free to ask! "}]

Car-proof upon request Full range of trade-in vehicles from new car dealers, vehicles bought off the street and vehicles bought at auction. Warranty:
 3 month/ 5,000km complimentary power train warranty!"}]

Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Nova Scotia
 
Stock # 32539

description:
[{'description': " Low Mileage!
 
  Compare at $43259 - Kentville Chryslers Price is just $41999! 
 
    This  2023 Honda CR-V is for sale today. 
 
A legend returns! For 2023, Honda completely revised the ubiquitous CR-V, with a host of performance, design and technological upgrades to give it an even bigger edge against rivals in the ever-heated crossover SUV segment. With roomy seating, wide-open sightlines, and sporty details throughout, the all-new interior of the 2023 CR-V makes it easy to settle in and enjoy the ride. Upgraded infotainment systems with even more active and passive safety systems ensure a serene and uncompromised ride in this SUV.This low mileage  SUV has just 11,300 kms. It's  nice in colour  . It has an automatic transmission and is powered by a  1.5L I4 16V GDI DOHC Turbo engine. 
 
 Our CR-V's trim level is Sport. This CR-V Sport steps things up with an express open/close sunroof, a power liftgate for rear cargo access, and a heated leather steering wheel, along with upgraded 18-inch aluminum wheels. With an all-wheel-drive system, this incredibly versatile and practical SUV features heated front seats, 60-40 folding split-bench rear seats, proximity keyless entry with push button start, adaptive cruise control, dual-zone climate control, remote engine start, and a refreshed 7-inch infotainment system with Apple CarPlay, Android Auto and Siri Eyes Free. Safety features include blind spot detection, front and rear collision mitigation, front pedestrian braking, lane keeping assist with lane departure warning, driver monitoring alert, and a rear camera. Additional features include front and rear cupholders, LED headlights with automatic high beams, USB-A/USB-C charging ports, and even more.
 
To apply right now for financing use this link : **********
 
 

At Kentville Chrysler, we have a professional and committed sales staff with many years of experience satisfying our customers' needs. 
While every reasonable effort is made to ensure the accuracy of this data, we are not responsible for any errors or omissions contained on these pages. Please verify any information with a representative. o~o "}]

description: [{'description': 'Discover the 2022 Honda CR-V LX Sport, a dynamic and versatile SUV now available at Bruce Honda in Yarmouth, NS. The CR-V LX Sport is designed to offer a perfect blend of reliability, performance, and modern features, making it an excellent choice for families, commuters, and adventurers alike.The exterior of the 2022 CR-V LX Sport is stylish and contemporary, featuring bold lines, a distinctive front grille, and sleek alloy wheels. Its refined appearance is further enhanced by LED daytime running lights and a sporty stance, ensuring you make a statement wherever you go.Under the hood, the 2022 CR-V LX Sport is powered by a robust 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, delivering 190 horsepower and a smooth driving experience. Paired with a continuously variable transmission (CVT), this powertrain provides excellent fuel efficiency and responsive handling, making it ideal for both city driving and long road trips.Inside the spacious and well-designed cabin, the 2022 CR-V LX Sport offers a comfortable and practical environment with high-quality materials and advanced features. The interior includes supportive cloth seats, a 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility, and Bluetooth connectivity. Additional features such as a multi-angle rearview camera, keyless entry, and push-button start add to the convenience and enjoyment of every drive.Safety is a top priority in the 2022 CR-V LX Sport, which comes equipped with Honda Sensing technologies. This suite of advanced safety and driver-assist features includes adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, collision mitigation braking, and road departure mitigation, providing peace of mind for you and your passengers on every journey.Bruce Honda, located at 166 Starrs Rd in Yarmouth, NS, invites you to explore the 2022 Honda CR-V LX Sport. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a reputation for excellence. '}]

description: [{'description': "Allow us to introduce our 2019 Honda CR-V Touring AWD that is a dream come true in Platinum White Pearl! Powered by a TurboCharged 1.5 Litre 4 Cylinder generating 190hp connected to an innovative CVT for amazing passing commands. This trendsetting All Wheel Drive SUV serves up approximately 6.9L/100km on the highway, has composed handling, and a comfortable ride. Our CR-V Touring garners second looks with its sculpted, distinctive stance with full LED headlights, hands-free power tailgate, sunroof, and great-looking alloy wheels on this machine. Prepare to be impressed with the premium interior of our CR-V Touring with its Smart Entry/Walk Away feature, remote engine start, sumptuous leather, heated power-adjustable front seats, a heated steering wheel, auto-dimming rearview mirror, rain-sensing windshield wipers, and easy fold-down 60/40 split rear seats. Staying safely connected is a breeze with our display audio touchscreen, Bluetooth, HondaLink, Apple CarPlay/Android Auto compatibility, available satellite-linked navigation with voice recognition. Honda's reputation for safety and durability is further enhanced with our Honda, outfitted with a multi-angle rearview camera, ACE body structure, advanced airbags, vehicle stability assist, and ABS. Honda Sensing, featuring lane-keeping assist, adaptive cruise control, and collision/road departure mitigation, is also included. Reward yourself with this Honda CR-V Touring! Save this Page and Call for Availability. We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership! Steele Chevrolet Atlantic Canada's Premier Pre-Owned Super Center. Being a GM Certified Pre-Owned vehicle ensures this unit has been fully inspected fully detailed serviced up to date and brought up to Certified standards. Market value priced for immediate delivery and ready to roll so if this is your next new to your vehicle do not hesitate. You've dealt with all the rest now get ready to deal with the BEST! Steele Chevrolet Buick GMC Cadillac ********** Metros' Premier Credit Specialist Team Good/Bad/New Credit? Divorce? Self-Employed? "}]

description: [{'description': "500+Used@ ********** * Phone ********** ------------------------------------------------------ Why buy a CenturyWholesale.ca used vehicle? ->WHOLESALE PRICING | Below Market-Value | SELLING TO YOU RATHER THAN THE AUCTION ->AS-TRADED | No MVI | No Warranty | No Exchange ->Professional EXTERIOR & INTERIOR DETAILING ->TRANSPARENT  CarFax Report ------------------------------------------------------ 150 Main St, Truro, Nova Scotia, B2N2V4 Our wholesale lot, located at 150 Main St. Truro and managed through Century Hyundai next door at 138 Main St., offers vehicles in their arriving condition without prior inspection or reconditioning. As a result, we cannot guarantee their running order or the extent of any necessary repairs. These vehicles come from various dealerships, so their history is unknown. You can view the current Carfax report in the photos section of the ad. These vehicles are available for yard drives only, unless a third-party inspection is confirmed and is limited to the Truro area. The inspection sticker is removed, and the purchaser is responsible for obtaining a valid motor vehicle inspection, along with any necessary pre-inspections or repairs. We provide a one-day transport permit, and delivery is not available. Trade-ins and dealer inquiries are welcome. Please note that financing is not available for these vehicles. The ad will be removed once the vehicle is sold. Due to the high volume of inquiries, we are unable to respond to questions regarding availability or the necessary work required for the vehicle to pass a motor vehicle inspection. The base LX trim is available with standard front or optional all-wheel drive. It has 17-inch alloys, LED brake and accent lights with projector headlights, automatic high beams (on AWD), active grille blocking, and capless fuel filler. It has push-button start, walk away door locking and remote start as standard. There is a four-speaker display audio system with Apple CarPlay and Android Autos standard on a 7.0-inch screen. EX has all-wheel drive standard and adds power windows with auto up and down, 18-inch alloys, fog lights, power moonroof, mirror-mounted turn signal repeaters, variable speed wipers, and Honda's LaneWatch passenger side blind-spot monitoring camera. EX also gains two speakers for the stereo (for a total of six) and two USB charge points for the rear seats. EX-L trim adds a power tailgate and an eight-speaker stereo. Carfax Link... ********** "}]

description: [{'description': 'Discover the 2023 Honda CR-V Sport, a versatile and stylish SUV now available at Bruce Honda in Yarmouth, NS. The CR-V Sport is designed to offer a perfect balance of performance, comfort, and advanced features, making it an excellent choice for families, commuters, and adventurers alike.The exterior of the 2023 CR-V Sport boasts a sleek and modern design, characterized by bold lines, a distinctive front grille, and sporty 19-inch alloy wheels. Its refined appearance is further enhanced by LED headlights, taillights, and fog lights, ensuring you make a statement wherever you go.Under the hood, the 2023 CR-V Sport is powered by a responsive 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, delivering 190 horsepower and a smooth driving experience. Paired with a continuously variable transmission (CVT), this powertrain provides excellent fuel efficiency and responsive handling, making it ideal for both city driving and long road trips.Inside the spacious and well-designed cabin, the 2023 CR-V Sport offers a comfortable and practical environment with high-quality materials and advanced features. The interior includes supportive cloth seats, a 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility, and Bluetooth connectivity. Additional features such as a multi-angle rearview camera, keyless entry, and push-button start add to the convenience and enjoyment of every drive.Safety is a top priority in the 2023 CR-V Sport, which comes equipped with Honda Sensing technologies. This suite of advanced safety and driver-assist features includes adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, collision mitigation braking, and road departure mitigation, providing peace of mind for you and your passengers on every journey.Bruce Honda, located at 166 Starrs Rd in Yarmouth, NS, invites you to explore the 2023 Honda CR-V Sport. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a reputation for excellence. '}]
